title: Duelspell

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to split their life energy into two, allowing them to die. They fucking die. You literally cut their soul in half they're dead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Split players cannot be given protection, because what the fuck is a Doctor gonna do about soul splitting magic.
- When split players die, their faction will be revealed. This is because they're dead and when you die your role gets revealed because that's how the game works.
- After split players die, they may not act at night, because they're dead and, once again, that's how the game works. If they have abilities they can normally use when dead, well, they can cope, because you killed their soul so hard they can't anymore.
- You may target yourself. Wait, why would you do that?

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Fucking murder every criminal and eviloder.

desc:

*Immortality is impossible. But, with a little work, you can fucking kill someone.*
